mn56:2.4: kho, tapassi → dīghatapassī (cck); dīghatapassi (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, mr)
mn56:7.9: nipphoṭeyya → nicchodeyya (bj); nicchādeyya (si, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); nippoṭheyya (sya1ed, sya2ed, km); niccoṭeyya (mr) | vālaṃ → thālaṃ (sya-all, mr)
mn56:11.8: “Manasi karohi, gahapati → gahapati gahapati (si, pts-vp-pli1ed), gahapati gahapati manasikarohi (sya-all, km), gahapati manasi karohi (mr)
mn56:18.1: anupubbiṃ kathaṃ → ānupubbīkathaṃ (bj); anupubbikathaṃ (sya-all, km, mr); ānupubbikathaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
